albums.title: Bloodshot Lies - The Album
albums.description: "Bloodshot Lies - The Album" gives you a musical experience of our songs that belong together. This is a value for value project. That means we make our music availible for free, and just ask if you receive any value, you return the value in a form that is meaningful to you

tracks.title: Mejor Versin
tracks.subtitle: Mejor Versin
tracks.summary: "Mejor versión" in Spanish translates to "best version" or "better version" in English, depending on the context. It can refer to striving to be the best version of oneself, or it can be used to describe a superior edition of something, like a book or software.

albums.title: Your Chance
albums.description: An album of songs we wrote almost 10 years from the time of this v4v release! Self produced with the help of our friend Anthony Picone, recorded in 2015. There are some cool musical ideas that we hope to revisit someday. We were still pretty young, our ages ranging from 17 to 26 and developing as musicians/songwriters, but it's fun to listen back and see what we were up to! www.doerfelverse.com

albums.title: DFB Volume 1
albums.description: A few tracks from back in our bluegrass days. Some originals and a few traditional with lead vocals from our sister Kim. These were originally recorded live for a radio program in 2007 when we were all still teenagers.

tracks.title: His Eye is on the Sparrow

albums.title: Music From The Doerfel-Verse
albums.description:
Welcome to our Music feed! Want to hear the stories behind the songs, live jams, Doerfel-gossip, and who knows what else from our Doerfel-Vault? You can, and it's free! Just subscribe in a podcasting 2.0 app!

We don't make money from streams and there are no ads. We want to share music we love making. We just ask if you find any value, to return whatever it's worth to you with time, talent, or treasure. - The Doerfels

albums.title: Kurtisdrums
albums.description:
I was born and raised in Buffalo, NY.

I grew up on the road in a band and I always had a passion for audio and video production! These are songs I wrote for fun.
I also drum and write songs with my brothers. We were Fuel On Fire but now we just go as The Doerfels. www.doerfelverse.com

albums.title: Wrath Of Banjo
albums.description: This is an album/feed I will be adding some of my new banjo songs to as I make them. These songs will be leaning towards edgy funky jazzy rock...with wrathful banjo! This is a Value for Value project. Learn more at www.doerfelverse.com

tracks.title: METAL IN THE BANJO
tracks.subtitle: METAL IN THE BANJO
tracks.summary:
METAL IN THE BANJO by TJ Doerfel(Sir TJ The Wrathful)
I made this song for Sir Libre after somehow it came up in discussion that I should make a metal banjo song. It took on it's own sound, not exactly metal, but close enough. However, after over 25 hours of creating and producing it, my Macbook with all the projects files, it's hard drive died. I was unable to recover the project or anything else on it and after trying to remove the HD, smashed it with a hammer with wrath. I had saved a few semi-mixed versions, and decided to move forward and release it. 
Fun fact: 5 string banjos are surprisingly heavy, coming in at around 12 pounds. It's because other than the neck, it has a lot of metal pecies that help make up its tone.

you can't kill the BANJO

albums.subtitle: METAL IN THE BANJO
albums.summary:
METAL IN THE BANJO by TJ Doerfel(Sir TJ The Wrathful)
I made this song for Sir Libre after somehow it came up in discussion that I should make a metal banjo song. It took on it's own sound, not exactly metal, but close enough. However, after over 25 hours of creating and producing it, my Macbook with all the projects files, it's hard drive died. I was unable to recover the project or anything else on it and after trying to remove the HD, smashed it with a hammer with wrath. I had saved a few semi-mixed versions, and decided to move forward and release it. 
Fun fact: 5 string banjos are surprisingly heavy, coming in at around 12 pounds. It's because other than the neck, it has a lot of metal pecies that help make up its tone.

albums.title: Ring That Bell
albums.description: My name is Jakob but most people call me Jdog. This album is filled with creative masterpieces of jdogness. My dad and uncles were in a band called the Doerfels and they slightly helped with my songs. I wrote all these songs all through my life. Enjoy!

albums.title: Beware of Banjo
albums.description:
In 2008, I locked myself in A room with a banjo and this is what came out. This is NOT typical, out of tune, twangy banjo music. I would say this is relaxing, acoustic, instrumental music. I made this as a solo project while performing with The Doerfels, the band I started with four of my younger brothers and our only sister. 
Anyways, If you dare to listen, Beware of Banjo!

If you receive any value from this music, which I loved making, please let me know with any kind of value! ITM TYFYC KTLD,

Sir TJ The Wrathful

tracks.title: The Dark Song(Live with The Doerfels)

albums.title: Generation Gap
albums.description:
Doug Yeomans is a Buffalo NY guitar legend. In 2009 when Ben Doerfel was 13 years old, Doug thought it would be cool to capture this time in a recording. Can you pick out the veteran from the 13 year old as they pick through these old traditional tunes? Doug is now part of the family as Ben married Dougs daughter, Emma in 2020. Anyways, I Hope you enjoy this magical album I had the honor of recording -  Sir TJ The Wrathful

Doerfels: https://www.doerfelverse.com
Doug Yoemans: https://dougyeomansmusic.com/

"The way Shreddy combines modern music with mandolin and mando-cello is out of this world amazing" - Sir TJ The Wrathful

www.doerfelverse.com

albums.title: Psalm 54
albums.description:
Psalm 54 sung word for word. My wife, Alandace, came up with the vocal melody and the chords, I (Shredward) recorded and produced this. Inspired by her!

CityBeach: music produced by Edward Doerfel(Shredward) www.doerfelverse.com

albums.title: You Are My World
albums.description:
Wrote this for our friend's daughter... Basically used my own daughter as inspiration so it's honestly about our daughter, Autumn... Just replaced her name with our friend's daughters name. 

Musical inspiration: Empire of the Sun and a little One Republic
